alert.note: Alert for Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:04PM CST until January 13 at 7:36PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tallahala Creek At Laurel affecting Jones County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tallahala Creek at Laurel. * WHEN...Until Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 13 feet, Agricultural and lowland flooding is becoming more widespread along and near the creek. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 3.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday afternoon to a crest of 14 feet Friday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 13 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Tallahala Creek Laurel 13.0 3.3 Wed 7 pm CST 4.6 14.0 9.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 1000 AM CST.
